project(pjsip_speex)
SET(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${THIRD_PARTY_LIB_TARGET_DIRECTORY})  
SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${THIRD_PARTY_LIB_TARGET_DIRECTORY})
add_compile_options(-DFLOATING_POINT=1)
add_compile_options(-D_USE_MATH_DEFINES)
include_directories(./include/)
if(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
elseif(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
add_compile_options(-DHAVE_CONFIG_H)
include_directories(./win32/)
endif()
SET(LIB_SPEEX_SOURCE 
./libspeex/arch.h
./libspeex/bits.c
./libspeex/buffer.c
./libspeex/cb_search.c
./libspeex/cb_search.h
./libspeex/cb_search_arm4.h
./libspeex/cb_search_bfin.h
./libspeex/cb_search_sse.h
#./libspeex/echo_diagnostic.m
./libspeex/exc_10_16_table.c
./libspeex/exc_10_32_table.c
./libspeex/exc_20_32_table.c
./libspeex/exc_5_256_table.c
./libspeex/exc_5_64_table.c
./libspeex/exc_8_128_table.c
./libspeex/fftwrap.c
./libspeex/fftwrap.h
./libspeex/filterbank.c
./libspeex/filterbank.h
./libspeex/filters.c
./libspeex/filters.h
./libspeex/filters_arm4.h
./libspeex/filters_bfin.h
./libspeex/filters_sse.h
./libspeex/fixed_arm4.h
./libspeex/fixed_arm5e.h
./libspeex/fixed_bfin.h
./libspeex/fixed_debug.h
./libspeex/fixed_generic.h
./libspeex/gain_table.c
./libspeex/gain_table_lbr.c
./libspeex/hexc_10_32_table.c
./libspeex/hexc_table.c
./libspeex/high_lsp_tables.c
./libspeex/jitter.c
./libspeex/kiss_fft.c
./libspeex/kiss_fft.h
./libspeex/kiss_fftr.c
./libspeex/kiss_fftr.h
./libspeex/lpc.c
./libspeex/lpc.h
./libspeex/lpc_bfin.h
./libspeex/lsp.c
./libspeex/lsp.h
./libspeex/lsp_bfin.h
./libspeex/lsp_tables_nb.c
./libspeex/ltp.c
./libspeex/ltp.h
./libspeex/ltp_arm4.h
./libspeex/ltp_bfin.h
./libspeex/ltp_sse.h
./libspeex/math_approx.h
./libspeex/mdf.c
./libspeex/misc_bfin.h
./libspeex/modes.c
./libspeex/modes.h
./libspeex/modes_wb.c
./libspeex/nb_celp.c
./libspeex/nb_celp.h
./libspeex/os_support.h
./libspeex/preprocess.c
./libspeex/pseudofloat.h
./libspeex/quant_lsp.c
./libspeex/quant_lsp.h
./libspeex/quant_lsp_bfin.h
./libspeex/resample.c
./libspeex/resample_sse.h
./libspeex/sb_celp.c
./libspeex/sb_celp.h
./libspeex/scal.c
./libspeex/smallft.c
./libspeex/smallft.h
./libspeex/speex.c
./libspeex/speex_callbacks.c
./libspeex/speex_header.c
./libspeex/stack_alloc.h
./libspeex/stereo.c
./libspeex/testdenoise.c
./libspeex/testecho.c
./libspeex/testenc.c
./libspeex/testenc_uwb.c
./libspeex/testenc_wb.c
./libspeex/testjitter.c
./libspeex/testresample.c
./libspeex/vbr.c
./libspeex/vbr.h
./libspeex/vorbis_psy.c
./libspeex/vorbis_psy.h
./libspeex/vq.c
./libspeex/vq.h
./libspeex/vq_arm4.h
./libspeex/vq_bfin.h
./libspeex/vq_sse.h
./libspeex/window.c
)
add_library(pjsip_speex ${LIB_SPEEX_SOURCE})
